Html:
Is it possible to link multiple CXML files so you can move between?

example in excel

Sheet 1 - is about breeders - generate CXML 

image = breeder's logo and facets about their dogs

Sheet 2 - details about their dogs CXML

image = dog breed  and its charateristics 

From sheet 1 I have a breeder called Good dogs that breeds beagles,  I would want to link to sheet 2 that has information about beagles

What would the link look like?

thanks in advance for any ideas,

Paul

Hi Paul,

You could have a link in the breeder info panel that could take the user to a second page hosting a collection.

The link could be as simple as http://<your site>/beagles.html, using some sort of naming convention for each dog breed means that you could use the excel string functions to generate the links for you.

Roger
